# A Bedder World

> Professional mattress removal and eco-friendly recycling service operating throughout the entire United States since 2011. Next-day pickup available in 1,000+ cities across all 50 states.

A Bedder World provides professional mattress and furniture removal with 90% recycling rate. Operating since 2011, we've recycled over 1 million mattresses throughout the entire United States.

## Key Services

- 90% of materials recycled (zero landfill commitment)
- Licensed, insured, next-day pickup available
